name: CameraLevel
summary: CameraLevel is a quick drop in level, similar to a DSLR's digital level, that can be overlayed on a camera preview layer.
description: CameraLevel uses the devices accelerometer to calculate the current pitch and roll of the device. It is a UIView subclass that can be overlayed on an AV preview layer. The level is intended to be used in photography applications, similar to the levels found on common DSLRs.
